name: DANC(ELF)LOOR
description:
Who are you in the dance floor?
This is a tribute to the Ballroom Scene, the culture mother of the voguing dance.

Not only poses, not only glamour, but a history built by the LGBTQIA+ (trans people first!), specially the non-white and from the suburbs. Now a worldwilde symbol of force and empowering, much respect!

Gouache, watercolor, markers and digital editing.

illustration by @numadessas at HIC ET NUNC
twitter.com/numadessas / soundcloud.com/numadessas / instagram.com/numadessas
